TopicTitle: My kerbal space program experiences,missions and flops

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone.im dbug113.im not to experienced but ill still share what i have achived.im posting this on my tablet so no pics.please dont laugh cause my missions are not 5000 ton elooo bases.im a newer player and my greatest acivement was a mun landing.

Edited August 8, 2016 by Dbug113
Fixed grammar issues

Greetings, and welcome to the forums! 

We've got a specific forum for folks to share what they've been up to in-game-- it's called "Mission Reports".  I'll move this there.

Welcome aboard!
